citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1130 am on
10-Jan-18.
Inspector knocked at door with no answer, called phone number on file, waited 30 minutes before leaving facility.
